author: Rebecca Armitage And Lucia Stein
title: How Donald Trump's relationship with the WHO fell apart
description: The US decision to cut funding to the WHO comes at a time when it says it needs financial support more than ever to fight the worst global pandemic in 100 years. Here's how we got to this point and why Donald Trump has become increasingly critical of the orga…
content:
Posted 
April 15, 2020 16:42:04
